item.title: Group of potholes near crossing, 12th February
item.description:
Large group of potholes in middle of road, cars swerving This stretch of road from double roundabout to old Bath road junction has 10+ potholes, ideally whole section needs resurfacing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairfield Parade, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: A deep pothole, impossible to spot which immediately burst my tyre., 12th February
item.description:
On Cirencester road near to the pedestrian crossing near Lily Brook Golf course. It’s on the opposite side of road to the golf course as you go up the hill.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 283, Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking of pedestrian access, 12th February
item.description:
The existing resurfacing has up until recently provided a narrow lane on the road for pedestrian access. However this has now been removed denying pedestrian access between Aldi and the Readings/Grovefield way roundabout. Please could access be reinstated: this is a much used path and it's closure is causing a long and unnecessary detour
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grovefield Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
